source_documents_processed: Use Case Diagram of an Online Shopping System

functional_requirements.description: System shall allow Web Customers to view items in the catalog.
System shall allow Registered Customers to make a purchase.
System shall allow New Customers to register and create an account.
System shall provide a checkout process for purchasing items.
System shall integrate with Payment Services such as PayPal and Credit Payment Service.
System shall authenticate users via an Identity Provider for secure login.

non_functional_requirements.description: System must ensure secure authentication for all users using Identity Provider.
System shall process payments within 2 seconds for a seamless checkout experience.
System interface shall be user-friendly for both Registered and New Customers.
